resources.string: This text view must be centered

\"PercentFrameLayout\" is in blue and \"MyPercentFrameLayout\" is in green. Both the layouts should have a centered TextView that says \"This text view must be centered\", but it is invisible in PercentFrameLayout because, it fails to extract layout attributes from the INCLUDE tag and assigns 0 to both width and height. MyPercentFrameLayout has a small fix in place for this
